bug.author: shuntaraw
bug.summary: correspondence_set is not populated in EvaluateRANSACBasedOnCorrespondence
bug.description:
Describe the bug RegistrationResult::correspondence_set_ is left empty even after successful RANSAC in EvaluateRANSACBasedOnCorrespondence().
Open3D/src/Open3D/Registration/Registration.cpp
Line 100 in 11a27bf
RegistrationResult EvaluateRANSACBasedOnCorrespondence(
Expected behavior RegistrationResult::correspondence_set_ should have the indices of inliers. Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Ubuntu 18.04 Python version: 2.7.15+ Open3D version: 0.7.0.0 Is this remote workstation?: no How did you install Open3D?: pip
